channel.title: Authors on Kevin Rue-Albrecht
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Kevin Rue-Albrecht

item.description: Kevin Rue-Albrecht is a postdoctoral researcher of computational biology in the Sansom Lab at the University of Oxford. His research interests include computational biology, software development and single-cell genomics. His research explores the immune response to infection, disease, and self antigens.

I am a postdoctoral researcher of computational biology in the Sansom Group at the University of Oxford. My research interests in computational biology include software engineering best practices, DevOps, single-cell genomics, and interactive data visualization. I particularly enjoy using and contributing R packages part of the Bioconductor project. A list of software packages that I maintain or contributed to is available on the Software page. My academic research primarily explores the host immune response to infection, disease, and self antigens.
